item.title: Opting out of haveibeenpwned
item.description: The increasing number of data breaches has become a concern for anyone trying to live a life of relative privacy. Just last month, the PowerSchool Data informed its customers that hackers stole data of 62 million students. Unless you have been practicing Extreme Privacy techniques for decades, you likely have been impacted by at least one data breach.
